title: Green River from the Ferry, Wyoming Territory
medium: Graphite, brush and watercolor, white gouache on gray wove paper.
description: Horizontal view of the river and sandbar in the foreground, receding diagonally to left.  Beyond, a line of castellated cliffs, with a fringe of trees at base.  Cliffs are a pale pink; river is blue, blue-gray and white; sky is white.
name: Drawing
